form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Ms. Rosen (for herself and Mr. Cramer) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services

form.official-title: To provide a combat status identifier equivalent for remotely piloted aircraft crew who conduct combat operations.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Combat Action Recognition and Evaluation (CARE) for Remotely Piloted Aircraft (RPA) Crews Act of 2025.

section.header: Combat status identifier equivalent for remotely piloted aircraft crew
section.text: Not later than 180 days after the date of the enactment of this Act, the Secretaries of the military departments shall establish a status identifier of equivalent merit as a combat status identifier for remotely piloted aircraft (RPA) crew who conduct combat operations.
